stop 'failing test' # FIXME

mkhomedir
mksourcedir

chezmoi remove --force $HOME${/}.bashrc
! exists $HOME/.bashrc
exists $HOME/.inputrc
exists $HOME/.ssh/config

chezmoi remove --force $HOME${/}.ssh
exists $HOME/.inputrc
! exists $HOME/.ssh/config

! chezmoi remove --force $HOME${/}.bashrc $HOME${/}.inputrc
stdout 'not in source state'
exists $HOME/.inputrc
